name: Sinking Ship
description:
https://youtu.be/M79-o5d40hU

The ship was hit by a giant leek and water is leaking in everywhere!

Escape from the ship while avoiding falling things and try to collect your treasure on the way out!

Jammers:

Kevin Lövgren - Programming

Björn Von Der Osten - Programming

Pernilla Larsson - Graphics

Hans Martin Quiel - Sound & Music
